name: Red Robin
description:
• Plot-oriented pixel style game, the gameplay includes some elements such as exploration, puzzle solving, and collection

  • Original art materials

  • Double ending, and the content of the ending is completely different, the duration of a week is 2-3 hours

  • Content-rich branch lines, some branch lines need to meet the collection conditions to open

  • The operation method is recommended to use the z key to confirm and investigate, the x key to cancel and open the menu, the arrow keys ↑ ↓ → ←to move, the running arrow key +Shift, F4 full screen

The game content may be updated with new plots in the future.
